manuscripts.edition1: A @corresp ref is used for the bibls to connect mss and editions. It is possible to do this via spreadsheet in the transform but I would want to think more about it. The trick will be matching these to the manuscript1 list…It is possible to hack this to make it so the source is the same as the manuscript1 column?
manuscript1: this column is a bit hacked as all the mss in this usage will come from the same source. So I will hack the script, perhaps, to allow a char-separated list that becomes separate mss all with the same source attribute.

notes: no Syriaca URI for the Eleazar commemorated with the Maccabees. Cf. https://syriaca.org/work/730 which also commemorates this person
